name: The 3Rs
description:
No need to worry about not knowing where to throw your trash when you see three bins in public places! In this educational point and click game, you will be able to learn or familiarize yourself with the items that can be harzardous, compostable, and recyclable. 

Languages: English and Chinese Platforms: Web, PC, Mobile Credits

Jiaxin Huang - Programmer

Lydia Fan - User Interface Artist

Xiaowen Huang - Artist

Freesound.org - Sound Effects

pixabay.com - Music
